explains: adj. 恼怒的；烦恼的；愤怒的
v. 使恼怒，激怒；恶化（exasperate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: 'Why won't you answer me?' he asked in an exasperated voice.
sentences.cn: “你为什么不愿意回答我？”他愤怒地问道。

sentences.en: The fox really exasperated them both.
sentences.cn: 狐狸真的把他们俩都激怒了。

sentences.en: The president was clearly exasperated by the whole saga.
sentences.cn: 校长很显然被这整个事件激怒了。
